name: Trash Rats
description:
Controls: WASD + Space to Dash (uses food!) Enter to interact (recruit new friends)

Don't let a fatberg destroy the sewers!! Protect your home as the hero we've all waited for, dreamed of, wished to be...

TRASH RAT

More detailed instructions:

Collect food, don't let it or trash get into the sewers. When you have enough food, go to the wise rat and recruit friends. Those friends will appear below and destroy the fatberg! When the fatberg gets to 0 you win! But at 100.......

Built in 48 hours using Godot 3.4 for the IGA Impact Game Jam 2022 (team of 3!)
